servinfo.title: DTC P0300 / P0301 / P0302 / P0303 / P0304 / P0305 / P0306: Misfire Detected

servinfosub.title: System Description
servinfosub.ptxt: ECM measure the angle of the crankshaft based on the pulse signal from the CKP sensor and CMP sensor for each cylinder. If it detects a large change in the angle speed of the crankshaft, it concludes occurrence of a misfire. When the number of misfire is counted by ECM beyond the DTC detecting condition, it determine the cylinder where the misfire occurred and output it as DTC.

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

item.ptxt: Misfire, which causes catalyst to overheat during 200 engine revolutions, is detected at 2 or more cylinders. (MIL flashes as long as this misfire occurs continuously.)
Misfire, which affects exhaust emission adversely during 1000 engine revolutions, is detected at 2 or more cylinders.

ptxt.emph: P0301: No.1 cylinder, P0302: No.2 cylinder, P0303: No.3 cylinder, P0304: No.4 cylinder, P0305: No.5 cylinder, P0306: No.6 cylinder

item.ptxt: Misfire, which causes catalyst to overheat during 200 engine revolutions, is detected at 1 cylinder. (MIL flashes as long as this misfire occurs continuously.)
Misfire, which affects exhaust emission adversely during 1000 engine revolutions, is detected at 1 cylinder.
When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out with 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.

attention3.ptxt: Check to make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this “DTC Confirmation Procedure”.

item.ptxt: Atmospheric pressure: higher than 75 kpa (560 mmHg) (Altitude: lower than 2790 m (9150 ft)).
Make sure that the ignition timing is good referring to Ignition Timing Inspection .

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch OFF, connect scan tool.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC by using scan tool if any.
Drive vehicle more than 37 mph (60 km/h) for more than 1 minute.
Stop vehicle and check DTC and pending DTC by using scan tool.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

testgroup.question: Does fuel level meter indicate “E” level (empty)?

testgroup.title: Air intake system and exhaust system inspection

test1.ptxt: Check air intake system and exhaust system for leakage.

testgroup.question: Are intake system and exhaust system in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check spark plug and ignition spark of cylinder where misfire occurs, referring to Spark Plug Inspection and Ignition Spark Check .

action.ptxt: Faulty ignition coil, wire harness or spark plug. If OK, substitute a known good ECM and recheck.

testgroup.title: Fuel injector and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check fuel injector circuit referring to Fuel Injector Circuit Check .

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check fuel pressure referring to Fuel Pressure Check .
Check fuel injector(s) referring to Fuel Injector Inspection .
Check EGR system referring to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .
Check fuel level sensor referring to Fuel Level Sensor Inspection .

item.ptxt: Engine compression: Refer to Compression Check .
Valve lash: Refer to Valve Lash (Clearance) Inspection .
Valve timing: Refer to LH (No.1) Bank 2nd Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation and 1st Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known good ECM and recheck.
